authorisedkeysmc.error.key-rejected:
This public key is not authorized!

Make sure you are using the correct key pair and try again.
authorisedkeysmc.error.invalid-signature: Invalid signature! The server cannot verify that you possess this key.
authorisedkeysmc.error.must-preregister:
You must have pre-register your public keys in advance!

You will most likely need to contact a server administrator for this.
authorisedkeysmc.error.server-auth-fail: The server could not prove its identity! (incorrect signature)
authorisedkeysmc.error.key-props:
Failed to load properties for the %1$s key pair:

%2$s
authorisedkeysmc.screen.registration.pre: You do not have any public keys registered.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.registration.off: This server is not in online mode, and your player is vulnerable to impersonation unless you bind a key.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.registration.pro:
Would you like to register?

By doing so, you can only join as this player if you possess the correct key pair.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.unknown-server-k:
The server on the IP address of %1$s has this public key:

%2$s

You should check that this public key is correct.

Do you wish to continue?
If so, the public key will be remembered for future log-ins.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.wrong-server-key:
The public key of %1$s doesn't match the public key on record!

Last known: §7%2$s§r
What was received: §c%3$s§r

Either the server simply got a new public key, purposefully or not, or your connection might be intercepted (MiTM attack).

§6Double check that the new public key is correct.§r

If you continue, the new public key will be kept.
Do you wish to continue?
authorisedkeysmc.screen.config.title: Key Pair Management
authorisedkeysmc.screen.config.keys.prop: The private key is encrypted with a password.
This key pair is used on the following servers:

No key pair selected.

Select an existing key pair or create a new one.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.first-run.title: AuthorisedKeysMC Setup Wizard
authorisedkeysmc.screen.first-run.body1:
This mod replaces traditional passwords with public key cryptography for authentication.

Notably, there is no password to remember, and no password to transmit to servers. Your key pairs are as safe as the rest of your files.

This mod does nothing unless it is also installed on the server!
authorisedkeysmc.screen.first-run.body2:
You will now create a new key pair. Advanced users may create multiple key pairs if they wish.

Proceed, then change the name if you want. You can optionally set a password if, e.g., multiple users use the same installation.

Lastly, click "Generate" to generate the key pair.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.server.title: Edit %1$s
authorisedkeysmc.screen.server.preamble: The server must also have AKMC installed. Otherwise, this mod does nothing.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.servers.title: Servers
authorisedkeysmc.screen.servers.empty: You have not joined any servers yet.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.new-key.title: Key Pair Creation
authorisedkeysmc.screen.new-key.preamble:
Creating a randomly generated key-pair.

The public key is automatically sent to the servers you configure it for. The private key is never shared and remains on disk.

NEVER SHARE YOUR PRIVATE KEYS!
authorisedkeysmc.screen.new-key.field.en: Encrypt this key pair with a password
authorisedkeysmc.screen.new-key.name-tak: There is already an existing key pair with that name!
authorisedkeysmc.screen.new-key.encrypti:
You will need to enter the password whenever this key pair is used.

Passwords are never transmitted to the server and are only used to decrypt the private key for use.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.new-key.waiting: Generating the key pair. Please wait for a short moment.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.delete-key.title: Confirm Key Pair Deletion
authorisedkeysmc.screen.delete-key.promp:
Are you sure you wish to §npermanently delete§r this key pair?

This operation is irreversible!
authorisedkeysmc.screen.decrypt-key.cach:
When decrypted, the private key will be temporarily cached.
Until the game closes, you do not need to enter the password again.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.decrypt-key.prom: The private key of "%1$s" needs to be decrypted with the correct password.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.decrypt-key.erro: Incorrect password or corrupted private key.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.decrypt-key.wait: Decrypting the private key. Please wait for a short moment.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.confirm-key.prom:
To ensure that you remember the password, the newly created "%1$s" key pair needs to be decrypted with that same password.

If you have already forgotten the password, you can create a fresh key pair.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.select-key.title: Select Key Pair
authorisedkeysmc.screen.select-key.promp: Select a key pair to use for this server.
authorisedkeysmc.screen.select-key.no-ke:
Select a key pair to view its properties.

If you do not have any, create one in the "Manage Keys" section.
You do not have a "default" key pair. Select a key pair to use for this server.
authorisedkeysmc.status.waiting-for-chal: Waiting for signature challenge from the server...
authorisedkeysmc.tooltip.set-password: Set, update, or erase this key pair's password
authorisedkeysmc.tooltip.must-select-key:
Select a key pair first.

You will also be prompted to select one if you try to join.
authorisedkeysmc.tooltip.select-key: Select a key pair to use for this server.
authorisedkeysmc.tooltip.unknown-host-ke:
Not yet known.

Try joining the server first.
authorisedkeysmc.tooltip.share-key: Copy the shareable public key to the clipboard.
authorisedkeysmc.tooltip.backup-key: Make a back-up of this key pair to a file or the clipboard.
authorisedkeysmc.tooltip.reload-mod:
Reload files and config.

Useful if you manually edited the mod files.
